    Sunward Pharmaceutical Sdn Bhd Vacancies Production Pharmacist

    October 24, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Sunward Pharmaceutical Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Production Pharmacist position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Job Description  / Responsibilities:
    • To ensure all products,  in process materials, production facilities and process are in accordance to codes of Good Manufacturing Practice(GMP) requirements through proper monitoring procedures, effective training program and up to date documentations.
    • Arrangement of manpower, ensure discipline and control of manpower to ensure smooth operation and production process of pharmaceutical products.
    • Responsible for all aspects of product, development activities which include upgrading of product quality, formulation, process validation and trouble-shooting.
    • Plan and initiate Quality improvement and ensure that all standard yield are maintained by production lines. 
    • well-versed in GMP and ISO 9001:2000
    • Review and make recommendation for improvement in area of manufacturing processes, safety, environment, sanitation and hygiene. 
    • Coordinate and provide effective training programs for subordinates/production staffs.
    • Monitor performance of products, operations and equipment against standard, promptly attend to changes and deviations. 
    • Assist and ensure all validations are conducted timely and accordingly.
    • Any other production related duties that may be assigned by management as occasions arise.

    Requirements:

    • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree in *Pharmacy/Pharmacology/Pharmaceutical Engineering or equivalent.
    *A registered Pharmacist with PHARMACY BOARD OF MALAYSIA. Preferably with working experience in relevant fields.
    • Good interpersonal and communication skills
    • Able to take up challenges and interested to build up a career in manufacturing environment in pharmaceutical industry
    • Passionate and self-motivated
    • Able to work in a fast pace environment
    • Able to handle stress
    • Willing to work on shifting schedule

    Company Overview

    Overview
    Sunward Pharmaceutical is a manufacturer and marketer of healthcare products. We have two generic pharmaceutical production factories, first manufacturing factories established in Singapore (established in 1968) and the other in Malaysia (established in 1978). Sunward‘s sales representation covers Doctors, Hospitals, Medical Centers, pharmacy and wholesalers. In order to promote our own products brand  as well as product from principals that we represent Sunward also exports its products to other Asia countries.
    Product & Services
    Pharmaceutical Products

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hospital job in Johor Bahru.
